about.title: ABOUT ME
about.p-1: I am Juan Pablo Ramirez, a System Engeneer whith a focus on Cybersecurity.
about.p-2: I am passionate about staying up to date with the latest technologies and have extensive experience using Open Source Incident Response Toolkits such us:
about.p-3: EDR LIMACHARLIE., WAZUH IDS , and Atomic Red Team tool for Adversay Simulation. I also have proficiency in Intelligence tools like Mittre ATT&CK and MISP.
about.p-4: Additionally, I possess knowledge in Penetration Testing usingvarious Penetration tools and OSINT gathering Techniques.

contact.title: GET IN TOUCH
contact.p: Please fill these form to get in touch. I'll will give you a quick response!
